name: Pupa Clic Technologies
tagline: A Task Force for Technology Development
description:
Build. Develop. Operate.
Pupa Clic a Task Force which comprises of 15+ years of tech expertise lead by the Founder and CEO, Deepak John J. Building India’s first Operating System in Cloud, MICROS at the age of 16 and venturing into niche technology such as Augmented Reality and IoT, the vision was well laid out which is to bring Idea’s, Innovation and Automation by combining tech elements such as Web, Mobile and Smart Electronics (IoT).
The firms development operations are handled by Abishek R and Antony Joseph Ephrem R who lead the team of 25 towards implementations of various technology stacks and updating the structure to suit recent trends in the market. 
READ MORE...

locations.address: G12 VGP Victory House Anna Salai
